Hra je skvělá, má dobrý příběh i dobrou grafiku, akorát tu nefungujou téměř žádné cheaty kromě noclipu a spawnování gelú, takže si třeba nemúžete zastřílet z Half-Life 1 a 2 zbraní, na co je teď Portal 1. Příběh je skvělý, Wheatley se svým britským přízvukem je někdy vtipný, ale někdy je i otravný a třeba Space core furt jen otravuje. Multiplayer velice oceňuju, alespoň co o něm vím, je skvělý, ale já osobně jsem ho ješte nehrál. A ješte editor levelú, ten je velice dobře udělaný a s modem BEE2 je možné vytvořit absolutně úžasné levely.Mohli by ale vydat nějáká DLC.
Doporučuju 11/10 :D

As a huge fan of spatial puzzles and physics problems, this game floored me.

Insanely fun challenges throughout, forcing you to think of every single possible use for the environment. 80% of the game is a tutorial where you're constantly learning new things, which is good, because the community-made maps are freaking impossible.

Co-op is a nice challenge, where you two are forced to find ways to allow both of you to move on. Requires good and specific communication, which they help by providing a "look here" indicator button. 

Also, the writing is beyond top-notch. GLADoS and Wheatley were some of the best written characters with some of the most amusing dialogue I've ever seen. 

This game can have you alternate between feeling smart and stupid within a matter of minutes. You'll see the world a bit differently once you hit the credits. (And the credits song? Pure talent.)

Welcome, test subject, it's Cave. Prime. From Earth One. I am speaking to you from across time and space! I am literally in the future! I am--Hold on... What? Alright, my assistant Greg tells me none of that's true. Got excited. Any way this so called game contains a set of test involving the quantum tunneling device and you are the bottleneck! We need you to get in there and run these test chambers and make sure this stuff is ready to be realeased. We don't want anymore expensive equipment being broken.

Cave Johnson, we're done here.
Really good game neat boss battle

At first I was aiming to buy Portal but I accidentally bought this but it was worth it. It's not just the story, you can make your own chambers, play with your friends or show your skills in building and playing towards others.  [spoiler] there is also easter eggs. [/spoiler]  So I recommend it!

Portal fué una obra maestra y una revolución para los juegos de puzzles.
Portal 2, aunque pareciera imposible, lo supera y con creces. 
Descubre Apperture por dentro, con escenarios mucho más abiertos, sin perder la linealidad maravillosa de la saga.
No puedo decir nada que no se haya dicho ya.
Si no has jugado Portal, compralo y juégalo. Luego vuélve y juega a este.
PD: El modo cooperativo también está muy bien.
100% recomendado.

Comprei esse jogo na promoção. Num fim de semana de Fevereiro, foi pra 4 reais. De fato, pelo preço gasto, eu me diverti pra caramba sozinho. Recomendo se você quer apenas isso.
Eu menti. Se você quer se divertir com um amigo que está presencialmente, recomendo também. Mas só isso, juro.
Se você quer brincar com outras pessoas ao redor do mundo e do Brasil, EU NÃO RECOMENDO. A comunidade aparentemente "migrou" pois não se encontra mais 1 viva alma no modo online.

This is the BEST puzzle game I've ever played and one of the best games I've ever played. This game is simply a masterpiece. The difference between Portal and Portal 2 is that Portal 2 is noticeably longer and it has more complicated story, and plot twists, and it feels like a totally different game. It doesen't feel like a Half Life 2 mod. On sale this game costs under 2 eur wich is amazing for an amazing game. This game features co-op mode, but sadly none of my friends have this game :( . It also features Steam workshop where you can make your own levels or try other player made puzzles. I would love to see a third Portal game! I hope it's going to happen in 2020. A man can dream. 10/10

It's in my top 10 games ever made period and it will never move. Whoever wrote this game deserves as many awards and recognition as possible, it flows amazingly, the gameplay is perfect, the puzzles are well thought out and overall the game is just a solid piece of work. Why on earth did they never write a 3rd game? I understand how difficult it would have been to live up to the hype etc but surely someone at valve wanted it to become a reality.

Un muy buen juego, convirtiendo aperture science en algo mas que unas cuantas camaras, si no en un mundo gigante y que desarrolla los personajes. No solo su historia es entretenida, tambien permite ver el concepto de portal desarrollado en el sistema cooperativo, en las camaras que puede crear la comunidad y de los mod que exande ese universo creado por Valve. Quizas falla en que existen momentos en que se puede tornar repetitivo, pero es un juego obligado tener en la biblioteca.
